content.rendered: Ossocubo is a small development team based in Italy. Our goal is to create fun, visually stunning and memorable game experiences that we’d never stop playing as artists, professionals, and passionate gamers alike.

excerpt.rendered: Ossocubo is a small development team based in Italy. Our goal is to create fun, visually stunning and memorable game experiences that we’d never stop playing as artists, professionals, and passionate gamers alike.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Blue Volta
jetpack-related-posts.author: Ossocubo
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Blue Volta an action adventure game with a deep narrative. It features extraordinary evocative settings and fully freehand drawn graphics. The player will take Zeno, The Last Librarian, through a life-changing trip. The quest for an ancient volume will steal Zeno away from the sleepy routine of the Citadel of…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Subscribe to our newsletter!
jetpack-related-posts.author: Ossocubo
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Do you want to receive news and extra content about Blue Volta before everyone else? We will only send it once a month and you will get some free wallpapers as a gift! Here's what you are going to get: Development updates Edgar's special recipes Stuff we like - what…
